name: Scalloped Potatoes I
author: Maryanne
summary: This recipe is so easy and quick. And quite tasty too!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed Cheddar cheese soup
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a medium mixing bowl combine the Cheddar cheese soup, onions and black pepper
Slice the potato into 1/4 inch slices
Arrange one layer of sliced potatoes in the bottom of the casserole dish
Spoon one layer of soup over the potatoes
Arrange another layer of potatoes and then more soup
Continue layering until all of the ingredients have been used
Sprinkle the Cheddar cheese over the top of the casserole
Bake until the cheese is bubbly and the potatoes fully cooked; approximately 45 minutes
